item.title: AWS Automation Toolkit
item.description:
AWS Automation Toolkit

A powerful Python-based toolkit designed to automate common AWS infrastructure management tasks and optimize cloud costs.

item.title: CyberDrill Lab
item.description:
CyberDrill Lab

An automated cybersecurity training environment that provides hands-on experience with real-world security scenarios using containerized vulnerable applications.
